topic.title: UNITS OF BLOOD TRANSFUSED FOLLOWING OESOPHAGECTOMY
topic.shortdesc: A code to identify the number of units of blood transfused to the PATIENT following an Oesophagectomy (the surgical removal of all or part of the oesophagus) during an Upper Gastrointestinal Cancer Care Spell.
